Requirements You are wielding your staff.

You @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Leap]{Leap} and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Shove]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Trip]{Trip} the target.
